Text:
This is just a repost of an earlier collection, however that torrent is now dead, so this is welcomed. Also, here is another collection of chess material:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5079717/Chess_Books_-_A_Complete_Library_of_Over_500_Books

Not as well-organized, but still worth picking over....enjoy.
I've just spot-checked and unfortunately the print quality is poor in most cases, so I probably won't be able to use it.
